ai-tha-ap219:1.2_0: of seeing the Kinsman of the Sun,
ai-tha-ap219:1.3_0: Quickly seized me like a mustard seed.”
ai-tha-ap219:1.4_0: The fever of passions fell off.
ai-tha-ap219:2.3_0: I was disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed regarding the highest goal.
ai-tha-ap219:2.4_0: as she was the fruit she took a fruit.
ai-tha-ap219:3.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap219:3.4_0: in the teaching of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap219:4.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap219:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap219:4.4_0: as she was the fruit she took a fruit.
ai-tha-ap219:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Tāḷapuṭa.
ai-tha-ap219:8.1_0: (also) gave the seventh position to the Elder Nun Tissaka.
